content: the easy crochet pullover is meant for the fall with long sleeves but can easily be made with short sleeves for summer as well very beginner friendly and fun to make this cropped crochet sweater design includes us women s sizes xs-xxl includes a link to a full length video tutorial as well add this one to your fall apparel wardrobe today it s fun to make and stylish to wear materials #1 fingering weight yarn i used lindy chain in color linen #1 fingering weight yarn 4 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy notes this pattern uses english us terminology this pattern made as women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small this top is worked in one piece from the top down we ll start with the yoke and then separate the sleeves and continue crocheting with the body the long sleeves can be added after the body is complete yarn needed short sleeve version = 370 440 500 560 620 680 yards long sleeve version = 680 730 780 830 880 930 yards gauge blocked 16 half_double_crochet x 9 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 33 body circumference x 14 66 long s = 39 body circumference x 14 66 long m = 45 body circumference x 15 55 long l = 51 body circumference x 16 44 long xl = 57 body circumference x 17 33 long xxl = 63 body circumference x 18 22 long thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
